title: Bonjour Sports Talk
description:
Kirk and Dave react to yesterday's show (00:00:10). Ime Udoka is reportedly headed to the Nets (00:10:00). Local Celtics fans find some questionable tweets from The Ringer's Wosny Lambre's and The Ringer has yet to respond (00:13:50). James Corden reads a Ricky Gervais joke verbatim on his show (00:22:00). Gerry and his producer Craig have an awkward interaction following the use of Halloween music on the show (00:26:19). It took Alice Shattuck and the host of a wrap up show discuss whether women are welcome on KMS (00:34:00). Amazon Prime launches a lineup of sports talk shows including 'Bonjour Sports Talk' to kick off your day (00:58:10).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
